\hypertarget{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_formula_proxy}{}\doxysection{Open\+XLSX\+::XLFormula\+Proxy Class Reference}
\label{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_formula_proxy}\index{OpenXLSX::XLFormulaProxy@{OpenXLSX::XLFormulaProxy}}


The \mbox{\hyperlink{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_formula_proxy}{XLFormula\+Proxy}} serves as a placeholder for \mbox{\hyperlink{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_formula}{XLFormula}} objects. This enable getting and setting formulas through the same interface.  




{\ttfamily \#include $<$XLFormula.\+hpp$>$}

\doxysubsection{Detailed Description}
The \mbox{\hyperlink{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_formula_proxy}{XLFormula\+Proxy}} serves as a placeholder for \mbox{\hyperlink{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_formula}{XLFormula}} objects. This enable getting and setting formulas through the same interface.
